actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: To repeal the amendment made by section 796 of the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2006, exempting from harboring sanctions compensation for alien volunteers for certain religious organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to repeal the provision (section 796 of the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2006) exempting from harboring sanctions compensation for alien volunteers for certain religious organizations.

titles.title: To repeal the amendment made by section 796 of the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2006, exempting from harboring sanctions compensation for alien volunteers for certain religious organizations.
